body.name: 3 Packs Leggings with Pockets for Women, Soft High Waisted Tummy Control Workout Yoga Pants (Reg & Plus Size)
features: 【Ultimate Soft Fabric & Upgraded Design】SYRINX Leggings are made from a new high quality fabric containing 92% Polyester, 8% Spandex. 4-way stretch and non see-through fabric allows you to move, bend, squat and stretch with ease. The skin-friendly fit allows you to feel light and breathable during multiple exercises.

【Two Side Pockets & 3 Packs Perfect Value】Women's yoga pants with pockets, no more worrying about your keys, phone, wallet and other essentials when doing yoga or working out. Even if you have something in your pocket to squeeze the leggings, the elastic design will maintain your overall appearance.

【High Waist Anti-Slip & Tummy Control】With moisture-wicking fabric, it helps you stay cool and comfortable all the time.Control your shape, lift your hips and perfectly cover your body from waist to ankle to achieve the ideal silhouette for elongated legs and a slimmer waist.

【Multiple Occasions & Stylish Daily Wear】Whether for yoga, cycling, hiking, running or daily dressing, slim leggings can make you stylish and flexible, SYRINX's women's high-waisted leggings are suitable for all weather, seasons and occasions, and will be praised by friends when paired with sneakers and sportswear.

【100% After-Sales Guarantee】 The three size options are US02-12 (small-medium), US14-24 (large-X-large) and US24-34 (XX-large). If you are not 100% satisfied with the product size or fabric, you can return it unconditionally within 30 days of purchase.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: High Waisted Tummy Control - Suitable for Women of Various Body Types
Two Deep Outside Pockets - Hold Your Daily Essentials Large diameter - You can keep your keys, phone or other essentials inside so you can focus on your outings.
Suitable for Wearing in Many Occasions Perfect fit for your skin - can be worn for yoga, gym, cycling, running and hiking.
Reference Size Chart Note: If your size is between two sizes, it is recommended that you choose the larger size! Note that light-colored clothes should not be washed with dark colors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super comfy and the pocket is great.
reviews.reviewText: Bought these for work but I wear them all the time now. So comfortable and they are high waisted and not see through at all. The pockets are great and deep enough for my phone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These are some of the most comfortable leggings I have ever bought! The gray ones are on the thin side, so they are not squat proof. But the black ones and the other pair are nice and thick and definitely squat proof. These are also very high waisted, which was a huge plus for me. It snatches in my problem area (stomach) so nicely! For reference, I am 5'10" and weigh over 220lbs. I got a S/M because I wanted that extra snatch in the waist. I wasn't worried about the size because if they didn't fit I would have given them to my daughter. But these fit amazingly! There is compression but not so much that I feel suffocated. I also don't feel like they are going to split or tear anywhere either, including when I'm squatting.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable but Thin...I prefer these other brands
reviews.reviewText: I wear fleece lined leggings most of the year and have tried many brands. I'm middleaged and curvy. Here is my take on these Syrinx leggings:PROS:-soft & VERY comfortable (feel like form fitting pajama pants)-does NOT PILL like thicker leggings-roomier in calves than average-decent pockets that fit my Samsung S23 Ultra-sizing as expected, plenty long too (I'm 5'4")CONS:-NOT heavyweight ("fleece lined" is a stretch of semantics)-Ambiguous design (no obvious front or back...tag is on side, no front waist pocket)-NOT very supportive...likely due to lower spandex content = muffin top overflow-Can't order just one color/itemI LOVE these leggings for wearing around the house, but due to thinness and lack of support, I wouldn't be comfortable wearing them outside or for running errands. I much prefer Yezii brand or Chrleisure for super thick leggings, and I always order XL for extra comfort, as most brands run small.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super soft. No, like … really, incredibly soft.
reviews.reviewText: I wasn’t expecting much for the price - literally just something to wear in my own backyard with pockets to hold may phone & dog treats. But, omg. These are my new favorite leggings by far. They are so, so soft. I am something like a leggings connoisseur. I have an entire shelf of them I stopped wearing the cheap, F21 types years ago & pretty much only wear that famous yoga brand, swoosh brand or occasionally, the ones from the famous lingerie store. I do have some of that one brand everyone said felt “like buttah” a few years ago but I wasn’t really impressed with them. These leggings, on the other hand, are ACTUALLY soft “like buttah”. The softest ones I own by a mile… and they have pockets!Here’s what else you need to know: they didn’t seem to pill or shrink in the washer/dryer, they aren’t see through, the pockets are big & stretchy enough to fully encompass my iPhone with a case and popsocket on it (unlike another pair of pocket leggings I have in which my phone is secure but peaks out of the top) plus lipgloss, AirPods & key fob. Also, the puppy has literally tried to climb my leg while I was wearing them and they didn’t snag or shred. I don’t think they are actually fleece lined as the listing says though. If so, it is a very fine dusting of fleece lol. Nothing like other thicker and/or lined winter leggings that I have. That’s not a big deal to me but, if you are specifically looking for warm and/or thick leggings, these aren’t it. Otherwise, they are absolutely perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very comfotable, no see through
reviews.reviewText: I am 5'1" 170lbs, I purchased the L/XL, they fit great. They have a lot of stretch, non see through and they hold you in. The material is very soft, the pockets are deep enough to hold your phone securely. I would definitely buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Soft and comfy, but can see through
reviews.reviewText: Product says you can’t see through and you totally can. Very thin leggings. Comfy, well stitched, made according to size, pockets are great. But the material is thinner than expected and will have to wear a long shirt or show some unexpected things lol.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smooth, stretchy, and NOT see through!
reviews.reviewText: So worth the $$, these are my go to gym attire. Not see through, its a lovely soft fabric, and its a lighter weight material. The pockets are incredible and hold my phone well so i can workout hands free

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Thin, but comfortable. Would buy again.
reviews.reviewText: I bought these because Walmart stopped selling my favorite leggings, and while they are thinner than I would like, they are VERY comfortable, they are not sheer, and they have a nice waistband that gives you some support in the tummy area. Also pockets are great!
I love these pants… I just wish the “tummy control” was a bit stronger…. They sit quite high too.. but that’s ok to me… :) love the pockets and the material I’d so soft and fantastic on the skin!!

I got the blue, black, and grey leggings and found them to be very soft and incredibly comfortable. They are nice and stretchy so if you want compression, these are not for you, but if you want comfort and a buttery soft feeling, I highly recommend these. The only issue, which is minor at best, is the pockets are a bit too high (almost up to my hip where other leggings I own are lower on the thigh making it easier for reaching the cell phone without lifting up your shirt). This is just a personal preference for me and may not matter to you. Still highly worth it. Given the fit, I probably could've gone with the large or extra large as they stretch nice and don't roll down on my tummy or constrict in any way, which is great if you have any gastrointestinal issues and can't handle pressure on the belly.

Happy to have disregarded the size chart. According to it, I should have bought a size L-XL for my 30 inch waist, but these pants are replacing another brand's S-M that are too loose on me now, so I took a chance. I wanted compression vs relaxed, and that is pretty much what I got with these, though I would have preferred them to be slightly tighter in the thighs.For reference, I am 5'4, 140lbs. After a 120lb weightloss, my physique is "formerly fat" - as in very much pliable. This is why size charts and measurements don't mean as much to me as they may to someone with a firmer form.One thing I want to point out is how tall the waist is on these. I don't believe I have a short torso, but these pants make it seem like I do! Pulled up, they reach the bottom of my bra.. Fortunately turning the waist down is an option, and this provides additional belly compression, which is a plus.I have yet to wash then wear these, so I can't speak to any wash/dry or shrinkage issues. If I encounter any, I will update.
These pants are so comfortable and thin enough that you don’t sweat in them. The side pockets are a added bonus.

I am usually a size medium. So I got the small/medium they are SUPER stretchy, almost to stretchy. not see through. They do not breath well which is horrible in a humid heat and with how high they go up.
